entries.title: Maritime Memories of South India: Major Publication Released
entries.summary: Our comprehensive study on Indo-Roman maritime trade networks integrates recent finds at Berenike with Tamil Sangam literature to reassess the scale of Indian Ocean exchange.

entries.title: Riders on the Monsoon: Indigenous Navigation Study Published
entries.summary: Analysis of palm-leaf manuscripts shows sophisticated indigenous navigation systems that leveraged monsoon winds and stellar bearings long before European 'discoveries'.
